configuration:
yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.queues default The queues at the this level (root is the root queue).
yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.capacity 100 Capacity of the queue (sum of all capacities shoud be 100).
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address {{ yarn_resourcemanager }}:{{ yarn_resourcemanager_resourcetracker_port }} Tracker address.
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true Whether to enable log aggregation.
yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds 604800 How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them.
yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir /var/log/hadoop-yarn/apps The directory where logs are aggregated.
yarn.app.mapreduce.am.staging-dir /user The staging dir used while submitting jobs.
yarn.resourcemanager.address {{ yarn_resourcemanager }}:{{ yarn_resourcemanager_port }} ResourceManager host:port for clients to submit jobs.
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address {{ yarn_resourcemanager }}:{{ yarn_resourcemanager_scheduler_port }} ResourceManager Scheduler RPC (for ApplicationMasters).
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname {{ yarn_resourcemanager }} ResourceManager hostname.
yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address {{ yarn_resourcemanager }}:{{ yarn_resourcemanager_webapp_port }}
yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address {{ yarn_resourcemanager }}:{{ yarn_resourcemanager_admin_port }}
yarn.nodemanager.localizer.address ${yarn.nodemanager.hostname}:{{ yarn_nodemanager_localizer_port }}
yarn.nodemanager.webapp.address ${yarn.nodemanager.hostname}:{{ yarn_nodemanager_webapp_port }}
yarn.nodemanager.address ${yarn.nodemanager.hostname}:{{ yarn_nodemanager_port }}
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle Shuffle service that needs to be set for Map Reduce applications.
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb {{ yarn_nodemanager_total_mem }} ...
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb {{ yarn_scheduler_min_mem }} ...
mapreduce.map.memory.mb {{ yarn_mapreduce_map_mem }} ...
mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb {{ yarn_mapreduce_reduce_mem }} ...
mapreduce.map.java.opts -Xmx3000m ...
mapreduce.reduce.java.opts -Xmx6000m ...
{% if timeline_service_enabled %}
Indicate to clients whether Timeline service is enabled or not. If enabled, the TimelineClient library used by end-users will post entities and events to the Timeline server. yarn.timeline-service.enabled true
The hostname of the Timeline service web application. yarn.timeline-service.hostname {{ yarn_timelineservice_hostname }}
{% else %}
Indicate to clients whether Timeline service is enabled or not. If enabled, the TimelineClient library used by end-users will post entities and events to the Timeline server. yarn.timeline-service.enabled false
{% endif %}
Enables cross-origin support (CORS) for web services where cross-origin web response headers are needed. For example, javascript making a web services request to the timeline server. yarn.timeline-service.http-cross-origin.enabled true
yarn.timeline-service.http-authentication.type simple
yarn.timeline-service.http-authentication.simple.anonymous.allowed true
yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores {{ yarn_nodemanager_vcores }}
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled false
yarn.nodemanager.process-kill-wait.ms 20000
yarn.nodemanager.delete.debug-delay-sec 36000
